generations.text:
Here's the complete BPMN 2.0 JSON model based on the provided pseudocode:

```json
{
  "definitions": {
    "id": "Definitions-0001",
    "targetNamespace": "http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn",
    "exporter": "BPMN Modeler",
    "exporterVersion": "1.0",
    "process": {
      "id": "Process_0001",
      "isExecutable": true,
      "flowElements": [
        {
          "id": "StartEvent_0001",
          "name": "Dismissal Process Start",
          "incoming": [],
          "outgoing": ["SequenceFlow_0001"],
          "$type": "bpmn:StartEvent"
        },
        {
          "id": "SendTask_0001",
          "name": "Dismissal sent to MPOO",
          "incoming": ["SequenceFlow_0001"],
          "outgoing": ["SequenceFlow_0002"],
          "$type": "bpmn:SendTask"
        },
        {
          "id": "UserTask_0001",
          "name": "Review dismissal",
          "incoming": ["SequenceFlow_0002"],
          "outgoing": ["SequenceFlow_0003"],
          "$type": "bpmn:UserTask"
        },
        {
          "id": "ExclusiveGateway_0001",
          "name": "Decision",
          "incoming": ["SequenceFlow_0003"],
          "outgoing": ["SequenceFlow_0004", "SequenceFlow_0005"],
          "default": "SequenceFlow_0005",
          "$type": "bpmn:ExclusiveGateway"
        },
        {
          "id": "ServiceTask_0001",
          "name": "Record opposition",
          "incoming": ["SequenceFlow_0004"],
          "outgoing": ["SequenceFlow_0006"],
          "$type": "bpmn:ServiceTask"
        },
        {
          "id": "EndEvent_0001",
          "name": "Dismissal Opposed",
          "incoming": ["SequenceFlow_0006"],
          "outgoing": [],
          "$type": "bpmn:EndEvent"
        },
        {
          "id": "ServiceTask_0002",
          "name": "Confirm dismissal",
          "incoming": ["SequenceFlow_0005"],
          "outgoing": ["SequenceFlow_0007"],
          "$type": "bpmn:ServiceTask"
        },
        {
          "id": "EndEvent_0002",
          "name": "Dismissal Confirmed",
          "incoming": ["SequenceFlow_0007"],
          "outgoing": [],
          "$type": "bpmn:EndEvent"
        },
        {
          "id": "SequenceFlow_0001",
          "sourceRef": "StartEvent_0001",
          "targetRef": "SendTask_0001",
          "$type": "bpmn:SequenceFlow"
        },
        {
          "id": "SequenceFlow_0002",
          "sourceRef": "SendTask_0001",
          "targetRef": "UserTask_0001",
          "$type": "bpmn:SequenceFlow"
        },
        {
          "id": "SequenceFlow_0003",
          "sourceRef": "UserTask_0001",
          "targetRef": "ExclusiveGateway_0001",
          "$type": "bpmn:SequenceFlow"
        },
        {
          "id": "SequenceFlow_0004",
          "sourceRef": "ExclusiveGateway_0001",
          "targetRef": "ServiceTask_0001",
          "conditionExpression": "${opposition == true}",
          "$type": "bpmn:SequenceFlow"
        },
        {
          "id": "SequenceFlow_0005",
          "sourceRef": "ExclusiveGateway_0001",
          "targetRef": "ServiceTask_0002",
          "conditionExpression": "${opposition == false}",
          "$type": "bpmn:SequenceFlow"
        },
        {
          "id": "SequenceFlow_0006",
          "sourceRef": "ServiceTask_0001",
          "targetRef": "EndEvent_0001",
          "$type": "bpmn:SequenceFlow"
        },
        {
          "id": "SequenceFlow_0007",
          "sourceRef": "ServiceTask_0002",
          "targetRef": "EndEvent_0002",
          "$type": "bpmn:SequenceFlow"
        }
      ]
    },
    "rootElements": [
      {
        "id": "Process_0001",
        "isExecutable": true,
        "flowElements": [
          "StartEvent_0001",
          "SendTask_0001",
          "UserTask_0001",
          "ExclusiveGateway_0001",
          "ServiceTask_0001",
          "EndEvent_0001",
          "ServiceTask_0002",
          "EndEvent_0002",
          "SequenceFlow_0001",
          "SequenceFlow_0002",
          "SequenceFlow_0003",
          "SequenceFlow_0004",
          "SequenceFlow_0005",
          "SequenceFlow_0006",
          "SequenceFlow_0007"
        ],
        "$type": "bpmn:Process"
      }
    ],
    "$type": "bpmn:Definitions"
  }
}
```

This JSON model includes:
1. A complete process with one start event and two end events
2. All required tasks and gateways
3. Proper sequence flows with conditions for the exclusive gateway
4. Unique IDs following the specified naming conventions
5. Strict adherence to BPMN 2.0 specifications
6. No boundary events (as none were specified in the pseudocode)
7. Proper gateway structure with explicit conditions
